title: SHANY Professional 13-Piece Cosmetic Brush Set with Pouch, Set of 12 Brushes and 1 Pouch, Red
description: The SHANY Professional 13-Piece Cosmetic Brush Set with Pouch (Set of 12 Brushes and 1 Pouch, Red) provides a complete assortment of brushes for makeup applications. Made from a combination of natural animal hair and synthetic hair, the set includes 12 key brushes that are soft and silky to the touch. Animal hair brushes apply makeup evenly and are easy to clean. For convenient storage and portability, the brushes come with a handy organizer pouch.Professional 13-PieceCosmetic Brush Setwith PouchAt a Glance:Basic set of 12 professional-grade cosmetics brushesNatural animal hair is soft, durable, and does not hold colorEasy to clean and dryConvenient storage pouch for easy organizationHandmade; SHANY logo engraved on the long handlesHandmade from natural animal hair and synthetic hair for even application.View larger.Complete Set of 12 Professional-Grade BrushesThis brush set features brushes used for applying powder, foundation, blush, and eye shadow. It also includes concealer, lip, spoolie, and mascara brushes and a dual eyebrow brush/lash comb. Each brush is designed with long, easy-to-grip handle for precision during application.Handmade from Animal Hair for a Soft, Silky FeelThe cosmetics brushes are made from a combination of natural animal hair and synthetic hair, so they are soft and silky on top, yet firm and durable on the bottom. The brushes allow you to apply colors smoothly, while pigment does not cling to the hairs after application, so you can blend and reuse colors without cleaning every time.Handmade with precision, each brush in the set is engraved with the SHANY logo.Easy to Clean and DryYou do not need to clean these brushes frequently, but when you do wash, it's easy--simply run the brushes under warm water, clean them with your favorite shampoo, and rinse thoroughly. You can let your brushes air dry or use a hair dryer for quicker results. Brushes should be cleaned once before first use.Storage Pouch for Organization and TravelFor easy organization, the brushes are packaged in a slender folding pouch, that you can toss into your gym bag or purse. Each individual brush arrives packaged in clear plastic wrap to protect from dirt and dust.About SHANY: Sleek. Sexy. Breathtaking.With a commitment to high quality, SHANY creates a variety of makeup kits, cases, and accessories. Offering easy accessibility to professional-quality makeup and accessories for at-home users, SHANY assembles and hand-selects every item in their assortment of makeup collections. All shadows are formulated with a natural mineral oil base and packaged in recyclable plastic. SHANY is a proud member of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), and does not test any makeup on animals. No animals are harmed to create these natural brushes.What's in the BoxSHANY Professional 13-Piece Cosmetic Brush Set with Pouch (Set of 12 Brushes and 1 Pouch, Red).Cosmetic Brush SetsStudio-QualityNatural CosmeticBrush SetEco-NaturalCosmetic Brush SetProfessionalCosmetic Brush Set

title: SHANY Professional Eyeshadow Pallette, Runway Collection, 162 Colors
description: This product contains 162 colored eyeshadows.  Whether you're going to work or on a night out with the girls, any color you will ever need is included!! Set comes in box that slides from right and left and also opens from the top.

title: SHANY Professional Makeup Kit, 78 Color
description: The SHANY Professional Makeup-Kit Palette (Set of 78 Colors) offers an all-in-one compact to suit a range of makeup needs. Featuring an assortment of shades, from soft pastels to bold hues, the makeup kit allows you to mix and match colors for day or night. The palette also contains neutral light and dark tones you can use as eyeliner, and peaches and pinks that are appropriate for highlighting your cheeks and body. Made from a natural mineral oil base, the versatile colors of the palette will last for hours.ProfessionalMakeup-Kit Palette(Set of 78 Colors)At a Glance:All-in-one makeup kit includes 60 eye shadows, 12 eyeliners, and 6 cheek colorsMineral oil-based powder resists smudging and fadingSlim design with mirror and eye shadow applicators for portabilityWash off easily with your normal face-cleansing routineSelected and packaged by hand; inspected twice for qualityAssortment of eye shadows, eyeliners, and cheek colors let you become your own makeup artist.View larger.Natural mineral oil base creates a vivid shade that is resistant to fading.View larger.All-in-One Kit for Easy Makeup ApplicationThe Professional Makeup-Kit Palette has shades for all occasions in one convenient kit. Featuring dozens of pretty neutrals and bold, vibrant shades, the palette also includes white, tan, and black hues to use as shadow or eyeliner. Plus, six pink-to-peach shades are ideal for cheek color or for highlighting parts of your body, like the collarbone and shoulders.The palette includes 60 1/2-inch round eye shadow pans, 12 rectangular eyeliner shades, and 6 1-inch round pans of hues for your cheeks.Long-Lasting Mineral Oil Base Resists SmudgingEach eye shadow in this palette is made from a natural mineral oil base that creates a vivid, highly pigmented shade, smooth application with every stroke, and resistance to fading or smudging.The eye shadows and cheek shades can be easily washed off at the end of the day using your normal makeup removal routine.Slim, Portable Design for Easy StorageMeasuring 10 inches long by 8 inches wide, the slender compact is lightweight and small enough to carry with you everywhere. If you want to go straight from the office to dinner, you can easily store this compact in your purse or gym bag. The case offers a large mirror and two eye shadow sponge applicators for added convenience.The kit does not include any brushes. Try pairing it with theSHANY Studio-Quality Natural Cosmetic Brush Set with Leather Pouch(sold separately) for easy, smooth application.Inspected Twice for Quality ControlEach shade of the kit has been made and assembled in the palette by hand for precision and quality. All makeup is inspected twice before shipping to ensure a high-quality, defect-free product.About SHANY: Sleek. Sexy. Breathtaking.With a commitment to high quality, SHANY creates a variety of makeup kits, cases, and accessories. Offering easy accessibility to professional-quality makeup and accessories for at-home users, SHANY assembles and hand-selects every item in their assortment of makeup collections. All shadows are formulated with a natural mineral oil base and packaged in recyclable plastic. SHANY is a proud member of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), and does not test any makeup on animals.What's in the BoxOne SHANY Professional Makeup-Kit Palette (Set of 78 Colors).Eyeshadow and Makeup SetsBold and Bright CollectionMetallic CollectionSunset CollectionProfessional Makeup-KitBoutiqueSmokey EyesMineral EyeSparkle

title: SHANY Eyeshadow Kit, Metallic Runway, 96 Color
description: There are no machine made eye shadows in this collection; each single eye shadow has been put in a palette by hand, as you can see in the pictures. Color rainbow has been the best selling brand in department stores and major beauty salons! Shany's products are beauty leaders in the market as their pigment quality is always top of the line. This particular eye shadow kit is made after 3 months of research on popular colors for cold and hot weather and day and night styles. What you see is a complete deluxe makeup kit that every woman must have. We take most pride in our product's quality since each single eye shadow will be inspected twice, before packaging, and before shipment. The colors are long lasting and will not fade after couple of hours unlike the other brands out there. Once u apply Shany eye shadow there is no need for reapplying since the color will stay until you wash it away. The variety of colors will allow you to do any kind of look you desire such as cat eyes, smokey eyes, and bridal look and so on. Once you have this kit you can simply get rid of any other eye shadow kit that you have because you'll get every color that you possibly need in this kit. This product will be the best gift for the woman you love the most.

title: SHANY Studio Quality Natural Cosmetic Brush Set with Leather Pouch, 24 Count
description: The SHANY Studio-Quality Natural Cosmetic Brush Set with Leather Pouch (Set of 24 Brushes, Goat and Badger Hair) provides professional-grade tools for all of your makeup applications. Made from natural animal hair, this set includes 24 soft, durable brushes ranging from large fan to small angled styles. The brushes apply makeup evenly and are easy to clean. For easy storage and portability, the brushes come packaged in a handy black organizer.Studio-Quality Natural Cosmetic Brush Set with Leather PouchAt a Glance:Complete set of 24 brushes for all cosmetics application needsNatural animal hair is soft, durable, and does not hold colorEasy to clean and dryConvenient storage pouch with soft lining for easy organization and travelSizes range from large fan to small angled stylesHandmade from natural goat and badger hair for smooth application.View larger.Complete Set of 24 Professional-Grade BrushesThis brush set offers you a professional makeup artist's tool kit for use at home. With a complete range of sizes and styles, you'll be able to find the right brush for the job. The set includes essential shadow, foundation, and powder brushes in multiple sizes, as well as liner, concealer, smudge brushes, and a dual eyebrow brush/lash comb.For added convenience, the most often-used brushes are duplicated so you can dedicate one set to pale pastels or neutrals and the second set to dark, vivid hues. And all of the brushes feature a long, easy-to-grip handle for precision during application.Handmade from Animal Hair for a Soft, Silky FeelThe cosmetics brushes are made from natural goat and badger hair, so they are soft and silky on top, yet firm and durable on the bottom. The brushes allow you to apply colors smoothly, while pigment does not cling to the hairs after application, so you can blend and reuse colors without cleaning every time.Handmade with care, each brush in the set is engraved with the SHANY logo.Easy to Clean and DryYou do not need to clean these brushes frequently, but when you do wash, it's easy--simply run the brushes under warm water, clean them with your favorite shampoo, and rinse thoroughly. You can let your brushes air dry or use a hair dryer for quicker results. Brushes should be cleaned once before first use.Convenient Storage Pouch for Organization and TravelFor easy organization, the brushes are packaged in a black folding pouch that you can easily toss into your gym bag or suitcase. Extendable trays in the pouch offer additional storage space for extra items, like your favorite jar ofSHANY Mineral Eye Sparkle Eye shadow (Set of 40 Jars)(sold separately). The soft interior lining provides padding to keep the brushes safe during travel.Each individual brush arrives packaged in a clear plastic wrap to protect it from dirt and dust.About SHANY: Sleek. Sexy. Breathtaking.With a commitment to high quality, SHANY creates a variety of makeup kits, cases, and accessories. Offering easy accessibility to professional-quality makeup and accessories for at-home users, SHANY assembles and hand-selects every item in their assortment of makeup collections. All shadows are formulated with a natural mineral oil base and packaged in recyclable plastic. SHANY is a proud member of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), and does not test any makeup on animals. No animals are harmed to create these natural brushes.What's in the BoxOne SHANY Studio-Quality Natural Cosmetic Brush Set with Leather Pouch (Set of 24 Brushes, Goat and Badger Hair).Cosmetic Brush SetsStudio-QualityNatural CosmeticBrush SetEco-NaturalCosmetic Brush SetProfessionalCosmetic Brush Set

title: SHANY Eyeshadow Palette, Bold and Bright Collection, Vivid, 120 Color
description: The SHANY Bold and Bright Collection Vivid Eye Shadow Palette (Set of 120 Colors) offers a complete assortment of eye shadows to suit both casual and formal attire. Including essential shades and trendy colors, the 1/2-inch square eye shadow pans are neatly assembled in a slender, double-layer compact that's easy to toss into your tote or store in your vanity. Made from a natural mineral oil base, the vivid colors of the eye shadow palette will last for hours--there's no need to reapply.Bold and Bright CollectionVivid Eye Shadow Palette(Set of 120 Colors)At a Glance:Wide variety of classic and bold shadow colorsMineral oil-based powder resists smudging and fadingSlim, double-layer design for easy storage and portabilityRemoves easily with your normal face-cleansing routineSelected and packaged by hand; inspected twice for qualityFeatures 120 classic and trendy shades for creating natural or playful looks.View larger.Natural mineral oil base creates a vivid shade that is resistant to fading.View larger.Eye Shadow Palette with 120 Bold ColorsWhether you want a pink matte look for work or a shimmering, golden hue for going out on the town, the Vivid Eye Shadow Palette has shades for the occasion in one convenient kit. A range of bright, trendy colors and classic shades are included in this palette set. Just like a professional makeup artist, you'll have a rainbow of blues, violets, greens, and other vibrant shades at your disposal.The Vivid Eye Shadow Palette Set also features baked colors that are a blend of two shades, heated together to create an entirely new look.Long-Lasting Mineral Oil Base Resists SmudgingEach eye shadow in this palette is made from a natural mineral oil base that creates a vivid, highly pigmented shade, smooth application with every stroke, and resistance to fading or smudging.For added convenience, the eye shadow can be easily washed off at the end of the day using your normal makeup removal routine.Slender, Double-Layer Case for Easy StorageDesigned as two palettes that close securely on top of each other, the double-layer compact can be tucked into an overnight bag or stored neatly away on your vanity table. The slender, lightweight case holds 120 shades in half-inch square pans.The palette does not include any brushes.
